Body 13.title: #333: Between the Carvings Were Gentle Images of Bright Flowers and Brilliantly Plumaged Hummingbirds
Body 13.about:
#333 was recorded throughout 2024 via interrupting random video streams. Included are two versions: a "video version" with the (often volatile) reactions to the music, which was frequently cut short by the fears of the streaming class; and a "studio version" with the complete live audio, including that which was never heard by its intended target/s.



Note: The video version cannot be embedded here directly and is instead included in the download.

 #323 is a drone piece lasting roughly 2 undecillion years (17,440,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000 hours). A petty excerpt has been included here for previewing.

Body 13.title: #298: The Astral Body Evaporates Like a Pure Incense

trackinfo.title: It Still Seeks the Objects of its Passions
It Bathes in the Steam of Spilt Blood
It Floats About the Place Where the Pleasures of its Life Elapsed
It Still Watches Over Treasures Which it Possessed and Buried
It Expands Itself in Painful Efforts to Make Fresh Material Organs
It Feels its Memory Gradually Vanish As All its Being Dissolves
Its Former Vices Rise Up Before it and Assume Monstrous Shapes
They Attack and Devour It
